short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just select your artist: Effortless music discovery and inline playback!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the Power of Music Discovery with our Chrome Extension! 

Simply select an artist or track name, and our innovative extension instantly presents you with top tracks in a convenient popup. 

Seamlessly explore the line-ups of parties and festivals, uncover captivating charts, and embark on a sonic journey like never before. Dive into the beats, groove to the rhythm, and listen right on the page without the need to visit the Spotify website. 

With customizable track display options, you have the ultimate control over your musical exploration. 

Elevate your music discovery experience and let the melodies guide you to new dimensions of auditory delight!
